title: Back to the Future
description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Out of Africa
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

title: The Breakfast Club
description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

title: The Color Purple
description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

title: The Goonies
description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

title: Witness
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: When a young Amish boy is the sole witness to a murder, a policeman goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

title: Brazil
description: A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.

title: Rocky IV
description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
description: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

title: Cocoon
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

title: Prizzi's Honor
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A professional hitman falls in love with a woman who is not only a fellow killer, but also hired to kill him.

title: Kiss of the Spider Woman
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A gay window dresser and a political prisoner are cellmates in a South American prison, where the former spins movies to the latter to pass the time.

title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post-apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

title: Commando
description: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

title: Fletch
description: Irwin 'Fletch' Fletcher, a Los Angeles journalist, really might be onto something when he goes undercover as a beach bum to investigate drugs and is asked to kill a man.

title: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
description: When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

title: St. Elmo's Fire
description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

title: Clue
description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer.

title: A View to a Kill
description: The recovery of a microchip from the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly.

title: Pale Rider
description: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

title: Mask
description: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempts to live as normal a life as possible.

title: The Jewel of the Nile
description: Joan Wilder is abducted while on a trip to the Nile, and Jack Colton must team up with Ralph to rescue her and find a legendary jewel.

title: Spies Like Us
description: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

title: Weird Science
description: Two teenage nerds create their idea of the perfect woman on their computer, who turns out to be a genie that makes their wishes come true.

title: After Hours
description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

title: Ladyhawke
description: A thief escapes from a medieval dungeon and finds himself assisting a knight and his lady who are under a Bishop's curse.

title: Legend
description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

title: Day of the Dead
description: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

title: Re-Animator
description: A dedicated student at a medical college and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

title: Silver Bullet
description: In a small town, a paraplegic boy and his sister discover that the creature killing the locals is a werewolf.

title: Teen Wolf
description: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

title: Desperately Seeking Susan
description: A bored suburban housewife, fascinated with a character she finds in the personals section, gets amnesia and wakes up thinking she is the free-spirited drifter named Susan.

title: The Trip to Bountiful
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: In 1940s Texas, an elderly woman is determined to visit her childhood home in Bountiful one last time.

title: Runaway Train
description: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

title: Agnes of God
description: A naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters. A court-appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.

title: To Live and Die in L.A.
description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

title: Return to Oz
description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is inexplicably called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

title: Real Genius
description: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities and their professor who intends to use their laser project for a military weapon.

title: Better Off Dead
description: A teenager has to battle all manner of obstacles to win his better-looking, hyper-popular girlfriend back from her new rich boyfriend.

title: Fright Night
description: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

title: European Vacation
description: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

title: Ran
description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them.
